review_data.title: sehr gute Pizza - neu auch mit Lieferservice
review_data.content: Sehr gute Pizza! Sonstige Auswahl an Menüs auch mehr als genügend - auch Pasta ist sehr gut. Sehr grosse Portionen....More

review_data.title: Die beste Pizza Zürichs ist koscher!
review_data.content: Ich war über Mittag im Fein & Schein. Eines der wenigen koscheren Restaurants in der Stadt. Ich bin nicht jüdisch...More

review_data.title: Nicht zu empfehlen
review_data.content: schlechtes Essen, schlechter Service, komische Leute. Der Service schien verwirrt und unorganisiert zu sein. Zudem war das Essen nicht frisch!

review_data.title: Very heimish
review_data.content: The restaurant was very informal. It felt like eating at a friend's place. The food was good and the portions generous. My wife had a pizza and I had a quiche. We couldn't finish it all and took the rests to our hotel.

review_data.title: Informal And Good
review_data.content: This restaurant is very informal, and caters to families and kids. We had pizza and some deserts, and everything we ordered was delicious. If you're looking for formal and fancy, this is not it, but if you want good food, it's definitely more than reasonable.

review_data.title: Хороший ресторан для вегетарианцев и соблюдающих кашрут
review_data.content: Мы случайно зашли в этот ресторан, так как, в обеденное время, все заведения рядом были переполнены. Мы получили первоклассный сервис...More

review_data.title: Slow service, bad food, loud noise
review_data.content: The restaurant wasn't even half full, but the noise was very loud, children screaming. It took a long time for the waitress to take our order. I could've ignored those things if the food was good, but it wasn't. The lasagne was very, I mean...More

review_data.title: Kosher dairy restaurant in Zurich
review_data.content: My companion and I had dinner here one evening during our stay in Zurich. It seems to be a family-run place. It is one of the few restaurants we ate in (only kosher or vegetarian ones) that had table service. The menu was fairly typical...More
